file_content.text: Master! At long last we are reunited! Oh, how I have missed you!
[Walk away]
Hey Seetoo! I've missed you, too.
Oh, master! My circuits overload with joy at hearing you say that.
[Sarcasm] Oh, good... you're still intact....
Oh? Master! I can see that you're busy! I'll just wait here for a better time!
How could you abandon me for five years? What do you think you've been doing?
I tried, master! I reminded everyone that we needed to find you on an hourly basis for thirty-eight consecutive days.
But you are right! I should have tried harder, master! I promise I will do everything in my power to make it up to you.
I could not mention it more because that level of badgering would have exceeded my maximum allowed rudeness!
Go away. Never talk to me again.
Oh, no! Doctor Oggurobb was correct! The stasis has clearly damaged your mind and altered your personality. What cruel fate!
Worry not, master! I promise to stand faithfully by your side through your recovery.
There are so many people within this facility. I am truly beside myself with excitement at the sheer number of lives I can now make more comfortable.
I have gathered all of my remaining comfort supplies in preparation. Unfortunately, there are not enough to completely pamper a facility of this size...
... but that is no excuse not to do everything I can! I simply need to be efficient and apply my efforts where they will provide the greatest joy.
Perhaps you could help me, master! As someone who knows the people here, you are well-equipped to determine which comforts would be most suitable for each part of the base.
Sounds like a good plan--I'll help.
A chance to inflict you upon the rest of the base? Oh, yes. Please sign me up.
I don't have time for this.
I understand, master. I will wait for your return, but please do not delay too long! Proper amenities are crucial to galactic resistance campaigns!
Excellent, master! Let us begin at once!
I shall explain each of the comfort-enhancing items available, and you will designate where to send them. No more than one per area, though! We must be fair!
Pick the best amenities for each section of the base. Got it.
I have several modified food processor control chips. These will produce low-calorie meals which are still highly nutritious!
I can personally construct some portable, non-perishable meals, allowing people to eat properly no matter where they might go.
I have a variety of extra pillows and padding for seat cushions. A simple, yet often-overlooked method for enhancing contentment!
Finally, I have a supply of synthetic Alderaanian nectar. I have no sense of smell, but I am told its aroma is utterly sublime when run through air circulators.
Got it.
Where should we allocate the modified food processor control chips?
Could you repeat that?
Certainly, master!
Those seem perfect for Doctor Oggurobb. Install them in the Research Lab.
On second thought, I don't have time for this right now.
Hylo and our logistics crews are sure to appreciate them. Install them in the Underworld Hangar.
Best to keep Aygo and our soldiers fit. Install them in our Military Wing.
That sounds ideal for our Force-sensitives. Install them in the Force Enclave.
Yes, master.
Where should we allocate the portable, non-perishable meals?
A good option for Doctor Oggurobb. Send them to the Research Lab.
Hylo and her crews could use portable meals. Send them to the Underworld Hangar.
That seems ideal for Aygo and our military forces. Send them to our Military Wing.
Force-sensitives need to eat, too. Send them to the Force Enclave.
As you say, master.
Where should we allocate the additional seat cushions?
Doctor Oggurobb does a lot of sitting. Send them to the Research Lab.
Hylo and her crews would enjoy lounging between supply runs. Send them to the Underworld Hangar.
Aygo and our military forces could use more comfortable seating. Send them to our Military Wing.
Perfect for our Force-sensitives. Send them to the Force Enclave.
At once, master!
That leaves the Alderaanian nectar for Doctor Oggurobb and the Research Lab.
That leaves the Alderaanian nectar for Captain Visz and our logistics crews.
That leaves the Alderaanian nectar for General Aygo and our military forces.
That leaves the Alderaanian nectar for Sana-rae and the Force Enclave.
Sounds good. Let's do it.
Wait. Start over. I've reconsidered.
Very well, master.
Excellent, master! I shall get started at once.
You should check in with each of the specialists--I'm sure they'll wish to praise the improvements we've surely made to their daily lives. Let me know how it goes!
[Let him continue]
Indeed I am! All the better to continue serving you.
The new commander! Greetings! I am C2-N2, steward of this facility. It is my extreme good fortune to serve you!
Nice to meet you.
I can assure you the pleasure and joy are all mine!
I already have one protocol droid, and he's annoying enough.
Ah yes, the 2V-series Imperial Protocol Droid--a model of efficiency and deferential fear.
However, I can assure you that I provide the highest possible level of logistics support, protocol services, and comfort enhancement.
Master! Were our comfort enhancements well-received?
It went well! Everyone is surprisingly happy with what you've done.
The reactions were a bit mixed. Some were happy, some weren't.
Not well at all. You've managed to upset just about everyone.
Oh my! Appreciation! This news fills me with such happiness! I--oh, dear! My joy circuits are overloading! I'm sorry master, I must avoid further stimulation--please excuse me!
Oh, I see. Well, at least we were partially successful.
Oh no! I can't help but feel that this is entirely my fault, because I am programmed to do so.
Fortunately, I have enough comfort supplies remaining to try again. Please, master, help me fix the situation.
Okay.
Could you list all the options for me again?
Master Aygo was quite pleased with the modified food processors.
We already know Mistress Visz appreciates the portable meals for her crews....
The Force Enclave has expressed their appreciation of the additional seat cushioning....
Let us hope we have properly distributed the comforts this time. Please check with the specialists again. I shall eagerly await your return!
I believe we can do better, master! Surely there is a way to make everybody happy!
Commander, is this a better time to spread comfort and joy throughout the base?
Remind me what you're talking about again?
[C2-N2 appears to have shut down for the time being. You should check back tomorrow.]
Greetings, Commander!
If I found more supplies, could you repeat your work to make the base more comfortable?
[Walk away]
Why certainly, Commander! In fact, it would be quite simple now that we know everyone's preferences. Merely keep me supplied and reap the rewards of maximized personal comfort!
I've got your supplies for the week.
Oh, excellent, Commander! I'll get started right away!
A chance to inflict you on the rest of the base? I can't wait.
I am pleased to report that our base is currently operating at maximum comfort! I hope you, too, are having a wonderful day!
